paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: ductal carcinoma in situ (T2N1M0) in left breast

individual_records.phenotype_details: ductal carcinoma in situ (T2N1M0) in left breast
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 38-year-old woman was diagnosed with ductal carcinoma in situ (T2N1M0) in her left breast based on a pathogenic variant in BRCA2 (c.1813dupA, p.(Ile605Asnfs*11) in exon 10; NM_000059.3).

functional_data.summary: No specific functional data provided in the paper.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical diagnosis.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with breast cancer.
key_quotes: A 38-year-old woman was diagnosed with ductal carcinoma in situ (T2N1M0) in her left breast based on a pathogenic variant in BRCA2 (c.1813dupA, p.(Ile605Asnfs*11) in exon 10; NM_000059.3).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was found in the paper.
